mapper.select: select g.game_id GameId, g.common_name GameName, z.total VersionCount, z.version_no LatestVersionNo, z.version_date LatestVersionDate from mug_game g left join ( select v.game_id, count(1) total, max(v.version_no) version_no, max(v.version_date) version_date from mug_version v group by v.game_id ) z on g.game_id = z.game_id

select v.version_id VersionId, v.game_id GameId, v.version_no VersionNo, v.version_info VersionInfo, v.version_date VersionDate from mug_version v where v.game_id = #{gameId} order by v.version_date, version_no
